00029 #include <cassert>
00030 
00031 #include "ProgressReporter.hpp"
00032 #include "Exception.hpp"
00033 #include "PetscTools.hpp"
00034 
00035 ProgressReporter::ProgressReporter(std::string outputDirectory, double startTime, double endTime)
00036     : mStartTime(startTime),
00037       mEndTime(endTime),
00038       mLastPercentage(UINT_MAX)
00039 {
00040     assert(startTime < endTime);
00041 
00042     // note we make sure we don't delete anything in the output directory
00043     OutputFileHandler handler(outputDirectory, false);
00044 
00045     // open the file on the master process only
00046     if ( PetscTools::AmMaster() )
00047     {
00048         mpFile = handler.OpenOutputFile("progress_status.txt");
00049     }
00050 }
00051 
00052 ProgressReporter::~ProgressReporter()
00053 {
00054     if (PetscTools::AmMaster())
00055     {
00056         if (mLastPercentage!=100)
00057         {
00058             *mpFile << "100% completed" << std::endl;
00059         }
00060         *mpFile << "..done!" << std::endl;
00061         mpFile->close();
00062     }
00063 }
00064 
00065 void ProgressReporter::Update(double currentTime)
00066 {
00067     unsigned percentage = (unsigned)( (currentTime - mStartTime)/(mEndTime - mStartTime)*100 );
00068     if (mLastPercentage==UINT_MAX || percentage > mLastPercentage)
00069     {
00070         if ( PetscTools::AmMaster() )
00071         {
00072             *mpFile << percentage << "% completed" << std::endl;
00073         }
00074         mLastPercentage = percentage;
00075     }
00076 }
00077 
00078 void ProgressReporter::PrintFinalising()
00079 {
00080     if ( PetscTools::AmMaster() )
00081     {
00082         *mpFile << "Finalising.." << std::endl;
00083     }
00084 }
00085 
00086 void ProgressReporter::PrintInitialising()
00087 {
00088     if ( PetscTools::AmMaster() )
00089     {
00090         *mpFile << "Initialising.." << std::endl;
00091     }
00092 }
